Desc eKYC & User Onboarding:
Your app can have a fast and seamless eKYC onboarding journey and verified users’ identification automatically to the National ID Database (Dukcapil).
No more manual data input and costly verification. With our solutions, your company will save money and time to acquire potential users in no time.
Desc Credit and Loan Services: Prevail insights and real-time financial data of your customers to provide faster and better decision making on loan approval. We can provide real-time balance, transaction history, income verification, and many more to support the approval process of the business.
Desc Security Surveillance Management: The implementation of Biometric System for Person Identification. Addressing real-time information of Identity on livestream using IP Camera AI-Driven. This Feature will elevate the convenience-of-living in the society serve as an alert for responding to security events opted-in staff and VIPs.
Desc Personal Finance Management: Optimize your financial product with our API Banking system. The seamless infrastructure allows third-party providers to exchange information between platforms to improve customer financial experience in retrieve Account Information, evaluate Transaction History and give information of Balance Statement.
about_us_main_text: TRUSTED PARTNER TO ACCELERATE YOUR JOURNEY OF DIGITAL TRANSFORMATION
about_us_column1:
Trustlink strives to empower your organization to accelerate its business growth by simplifying your customer onboarding process. 

TrustLink offers biometrics based identity verification solutions driven by state of the art AI technology that enables our clients to process customer onboarding in a more seamless, less time consuming and more cost efficient way.
about_us_column2:
As the official partner of the Indonesian Ministry of Home Affairs (Dukcapil) through Platform Bersama, TrustLink has direct access to more than 200 million National ID database which ensure our clients meets with the highest degree of compliance in identity verification.

With TrustLink, you will have peace of mind in growing your business.
trust_verify_subtitle:
Our solution enables your business to access the national ID database in order to verify your customer identity in a fast and secure manner. 

 Using AI technology, Trustverify will increase accuracy and provide your business with maximum conversation rate in both biometric and demographic verification result.
trust_scan_title: SCAN YOUR CUSTOMER ID DOCUMENT ACCURATELY
trust_scan_subtitle: Our OCR technology is build to scan, recognize, extract, and auto-fill your customer data directly from their national ID card into your business workflow.
trust_live_title: EASY TO USE, NON-INVASIVE PASSIVE LIVENESS  DETECTION
trust_live_subtitle: With just a single selfie, our Passive Liveness Detection Technology will increase the level of security to prevent fraud by confirming user is the right person and provides assurance that it is a real person.
trust_vision_subtitle: Our facial recognition technology powered by AI and advanced analytics is able to easily identify individuals in image or video taken by IP camera.
use_case_1_app3: Fast & effective customer on boarding process
use_case_2_title: Improve your conversion rates while minimizing risks
use_case_2_description:
Get a clear picture of your customer's identity with effective identity document verification and biometric authentication to Improve conversion rates and build trust with your customers.
With TrustLink identity platform, you can onboard and authenticate new and existing customers at 5G speeds.
use_case_3_title: Verify your drivers and know who is behind the wheel
use_case_3_description:
Trustlink identity verification solutions allows you to keep track the integrity of your drivers. 
Securely capture documents, read them with ease, and easily verify their identity. 
Prevent fraud while greatly improving the customer experience.
why_us_1_desc: Integrate your business ecosystem with our API based KYC and customer verification solutions in no time and hassle free
why_us_2_title: Proven State Of The Art Technology
why_us_2_desc: Our solutions includes biometric facial recognition, Passive Liveness, and OCR which have been certified by NIST and iBETA
why_us_3_desc: Our solutions will optimise your conversion rates by leveraging our state of the art AI technology for a fast and accurate customer identity verification.
why_us_4_desc: As the official partner of Dukcapil, we ensure your business meet all regulatory requirements while delivering the best digital onboarding experience.
